title: Fragmentary Sculpture of a Recumbent Lion
period: Late Ptolemaic Period to Roman Imperial Period
description:
Fragmentary agate sculpture of a recumbent lion. Very fine work with details of paws and ribs indicated by incisions. Stone is tan-brown in color. 
Condition: Head, front legs, rump and tail lost. Scattered areas of body chipped.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
